author: Opinion by Dean Obeidallah
title: Opinion: Trump's twisted take on Putin's war
description: With much of the world united in horror over Russian President Vladimir Putin's unprovoked attack on Ukraine -- a brutal assault that has killed many, including children, and has created a growing refugee crisis -- you'd think it would be hard to find a globa…
content: Dean Obeidallah, a former attorney, is the host of SiriusXM radio's daily program "The Dean Obeidallah Show" and a columnist for The Daily Beast. Follow him @DeanObeidallah. The opinions expressed in… [+4569 chars]
